summary_comment: Professor Garver is highly regarded for his comprehensive knowledge and ability to explain complex concepts clearly. Students find his classes both challenging and engaging, with many noting his dedication to helping them succeed. He is strongly recommended for both exercise science majors and those requiring the course, thanks to his expertise and supportive teaching style.
summary_comment_short: Professor Garver is an excellent instructor known for his deep knowledge and ability to explain complex concepts clearly. Students find his classes both challenging and engaging, with many recommending him highly for those in the Exercise Science field or anyone needing to take his course.

Ratings.comment: Matt knows exactly what he is talking about and is very good at putting it into language everyone can understand. His quizzes and tests are multiple choice but they are difficult. I left his class and I actually learned something and even developed interest in the Exercise Science field.
Matt is THE DUDE! Loves teaching the material, extremely helpful, very personal guy, extra nice..really cares about his students. Stand-up character.

challenging class - excellent professor. extra effort to help students. really fun teacher. knows what he's talking about. would definitely recommend him to any exercise science major, or anyone who needs his class.
